title: Emmerdale spoilers: Vanessa gets arrested tonight
text:
Vanessa Woodfield (Michelle Hardwick) has been having an incredibly tough time in Emmerdale as of late, but matters are set to get much worse her in tonight’s episode when she gets arrested!

Vanessa and Tracy’s (Amy Walsh) world came crashing down when they discovered that Frank (Michael Praed) had lost his life in the factory fire. If that wasn’t hard enough for the pair to deal with, their dad was painted as a villain, as all in the village believed that he was the one who started the inferno in the first place.

Tracy finally discovered the truth last week, when Kerry (Laura Norton) confessed, and a subsequent brawl between the two women resulted in Kerry ending up in hospital.

With Vanessa now aware of who’s really responsible for the factory fire, she’s enraged during tonight’s episode, and heads down to the hospital.

Advertisement

Advertisement

An argument soon ensues, and — during said argument — Vanessa accidentally hits a nurse. Afterwards, she’s arrested for her actions.

Is Vanessa in serious trouble?

Or could she perhaps seize this opportunity and spill all about Kerry’s involvement in the fire to the police?

Emmerdale continues on Tuesday 8th October at 7pm on ITV.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Vanessa's got some explaining to do!
